full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 763 Filed 08/10/22 Page 56 of 197 2597
LCHVMAX2
Richards - direct
1 Q. And where were you before 2014?
2 A. Prior to that I was at the Miami division's Palm Beach resident agency. I was there in 2006 to 2014.
3 Q. Okay. And prior to 2006, where were you stationed?
4 A. I was stationed at the Covington resident agency at the Louisville division in Kentucky.
5 Q. I want to direct your attention to 2006, when you were in the Palm Beach area. Okay?
6 A. Okay.
7 Q. Were you assigned to a particular unit in 2006?
8 A. Yes. At that time I was assigned to squad PB2.
9 Q. And what is squad PV2?
10 A. It's PB2.
11 Q. PB2.
12 A. Yes. It's the violent crimes squad and safe streets task force.
13 Q. And were you involved at that point in an investigation regarding Jeffrey Epstein?
14 A. Yes.
15 Q. And did part of your job during that investigation involve talking to witnesses in that case?
16 A. Yes.
17 Q. You indicated that as part of your training as an FBI agent, you are trained to do interview techniques with witnesses, right?
18 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00014162
